project.description: Kuali-research-docker is a git repository that contains bash scripts for building docker images from kuali module source code and deploying them as containers in specified environments. This job pulls the kuali-research-docker repo into a specified directory.

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: GIT_REPO_URL
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: The git repository from which this job will pull the docker build context directories and scripts to run the docker commands.

secureScript.script: def url = "git@github.com:bu-ist/kuali-research-docker.git" return "<input type='text' readonly=true name='value' style='width:400px;font-family:monospace;' value='" + url + "'>"

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' name='value' value='error' style='width:400px;' disabled=true>"

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: GIT_BRANCH
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: The git branch from which this job will pull the docker build context directories and scripts to run the docker commands.

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' name='value' value='error' style='width:400px;' disabled=true>"

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: TARGET_DIRECTORY
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: Pull the git repository containing the scripts to this directory.

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' name='value' value='error' style='width:400px;' disabled=true>"

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
[ "$VERBOSE" == false ] && set +x
branchExists() { local branchName="$1" local retval="$(git rev-parse --verify $branchName 2>/dev/null)" [ -n "$retval" ] && true || false }
# Fix affects of active choices reactive parameter bug. The variables trail with added comma. GIT_BRANCH=$(echo "$GIT_BRANCH" | sed 's/,//g') GIT_REPO_URL=$(echo "$GIT_REPO_URL" | sed 's/,//g') TARGET_DIRECTORY=$(echo "$TARGET_DIRECTORY" | sed 's/,//g')
[ ! -d $TARGET_DIRECTORY ] && mkdir -p $TARGET_DIRECTORY cd $TARGET_DIRECTORY
if [ ! -d $TARGET_DIRECTORY/.git ] ; then git init git config user.email "jenkins@bu.edu" git config user.name jenkins git remote add github $GIT_REPO_URL fi
eval "ssh-agent -k" || true eval `ssh-agent -s` ssh-add /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/bu_github_id_docker_rsa git fetch github $GIT_BRANCH
if branchExists "$GIT_BRANCH" ; then git reset --hard FETCH_HEAD else git checkout -b $GIT_BRANCH remotes/github/$GIT_BRANCH fi
eval "ssh-agent -k" || true
